tool_description: MangaEden is today one of the best sources where readers can access high-quality manga from leading publishers for free. Readers have access to a wide range of classic genres, summaries, manga art-books, and popular fiction and non-fiction manga-titles.
name: Manga Eden
title: Manga Eden

api_list.name: Manga List
api_list.description: - dictionaries in the key "manga" contains the manga's image ("im"), title ("t"), ID ("i"), alias ("a"), status ("s"), last chapter date ("ld"), hits ("h")  - "page", "start", "end" and "total" are self explanatory

optional_parameters.name: p
optional_parameters.description: Same as above but returns only 500 manga's informations (from manga X*500 to (X+1)*500, where X is the page fetched from the GET parameter 'p')

api_list.name: Manga info and chapters list
api_list.description: Returned data: all the informations and chapters of the manga.

required_parameters.name: manga.id
required_parameters.description: Where [manga.id] is the manga's id you can get with the previous api call
